objectiveA.objDescription: Capture the enemy Prison Camp to summon your Cavalry. Camps can be retaken by Heroes and Minions, so guard them well!

objectiveB.objDescription: Cavalry soldiers charge down each lane when summoned granting increased damage and movement speed to nearby Allied Heroes.

objectiveC.objDescription: Each team’s Core has been replaced by a General who fights against attacking enemies. Destroying a Keep reduces the General’s Armor.

objectiveA.objDescription: Queen Nightshade will periodically summon a Seed. Defeat its Shambler Defenders and gather it for your team!

objectiveB.objDescription: Upon gathering three Seeds, Garden Terrors will immediately burrow to each lane.

objectiveC.objDescription: Garden Terrors disable enemy towers and forts, so fight alongside them!

objectiveA.objDescription: At regular intervals, a payload spawns at the center of the battleground that can be contested by both teams.

objectiveB.objDescription: Stand next to the payload and move it to its destination. Prevent the enemy from trying to do the same.

objectiveC.objDescription: Once a team escorts the payload to its destination, it will fire upon the enemy’s forts!

objectiveA.objDescription: Control points activate occasionally. Stand within them to capture them. Fully capturing a point grants you control of a giant mech.

objectiveB.objDescription: The Triglav Protector mech is controlled by two players: one pilot and one gunner. Work together!

objectiveC.objDescription: The Protector's abilities deal incredible damage to structures and Heroes alike. Use it to lay waste to your enemy.

objectiveA.objDescription: The Haunted Mines will periodically open with an Undead Army underneath!

objectiveB.objDescription: Destroy the Undead and collect their Skulls to power your Golems!

objectiveC.objDescription: After the Army has been defeated, the Golems will arise for both teams! The more Skulls your team collects, the stronger your Golem!

objectiveA.objDescription: Both Cores are protected by a barrier that cannot be attacked by Heroes. To be victorious, you must activate Altars.

objectiveB.objDescription: Periodically Altars will rise across the battlefield. Activate them to have your Bell Towers fire upon the enemy's Core.

objectiveC.objDescription: Destroy your enemy's Towers to bring them under your team's control. The more Towers you have, the more damage an altar will do.

objectiveA.objDescription: The Infernal Shrines periodically gather power. Activate them and prepare for a fight.

objectiveB.objDescription: Slay 40 Guardians before the enemy team to bring forth a mighty Punisher.

objectiveC.objDescription: Punishers have one of three devastating powers. Be careful, they focus on attacking Heroes above all else.

objectiveA.objDescription: The angel lieutenant Ilarian and the demon lord Beleth are locked in an endless war.

objectiveB.objDescription: Aid your immortal ally against his foe to claim victory.

objectiveC.objDescription: Rally to your immortal as he wreaks havoc on the enemy's forts!

objectiveA.objDescription: Enemy spider minions and Heroes drop magical Gems upon death. Gather as many as you can.

objectiveB.objDescription: Relinquish your Gems at one of the Spider Queen's Altars or you will drop them all when you die!

objectiveC.objDescription: Whichever team turns in enough Gems first will unleash the Webweavers to destroy their enemy's defenses.

objectiveA.objDescription: Temples will periodically activate. Stand within their grounds to capture their power!

objectiveB.objDescription: Stand firm and the Temple will unleash a blistering onslaught on your enemy's forts!

objectiveC.objDescription: Guardians will try to wrest control of their Temples from your team. Hold them off to keep the Temple's power for yourselves!

objectiveA.objDescription: Attack Treasure Chests and Mercenaries to collect Doubloons.

objectiveB.objDescription: Hand your Doubloons over to Blackheart or you will drop them all when you die!

objectiveC.objDescription: After receiving enough Doubloons from your Team, Blackheart will bombard your Enemy's forts!

objectiveA.objDescription: There are two Shrines your team needs to control to activate the Dragon Knight's statue!

objectiveB.objDescription: While activated, bring a Hero to the statue to free him from his prison!

objectiveC.objDescription: Use the Dragon's immense power to level enemy Forts!

objectiveA.objDescription: The Raven Lord will create Tributes periodically. Gather them for your team!

objectiveB.objDescription: Upon capturing three Tributes, the Raven Lord will curse your enemies!

objectiveC.objDescription: Cursed Forts will not attack, and cursed Minions are reduced to 1 Health.

objectiveA.objDescription: Periodically two beacons will activate. Capture both to fill your Holding Cell with Zerg.

objectiveB.objDescription: Once either Holding Cell fills, both open and unleash waves of Zerg at each team’s base.

objectiveC.objDescription: Hold out against the enemy’s Zerg while helping yours. The Zerg will attack Heroes, so engage cautiously.

objectiveA.objDescription: Multiple Warheads spawn periodically across the battleground.

objectiveB.objDescription: Pick up a Warhead to activate your Nuke. Use it or you will drop it when you die!

objectiveC.objDescription: Launch Nukes to devastate the enemy team's fortifications.
